io::FileNotFoundException Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <FileNotFoundException.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::FileNotFoundException:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Thrown if specified file or path is not found or if the file cannot be opened for some other reason.

(for example if the file tried to be opened is a directory)
